channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish dumped beside commercial bins, 16th August
item.description:
The commercial bins have moved to the green and rubbish dumped beside them. The rubbish has been there for quite a while.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Bags of household waste, 16th August
item.description:
Bags of household waste including rotting food outside Aden Lodge. Residents in this block persistently dump their rubbish here. it is digusting for everyone else
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Aden Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow lines, 16th August
item.description:
The whole street now consists of either yellow lines or parking bays. As there are not even enough bays to accommodate residents where do you suggest the residents and/or visitors or tradesmen park their vehicles !!!!! This needs to be rectified asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elstree Gardens, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street/gutter sweeping not being carried out in Little Bornes, SE21 in front of No's 6 to 44., 16th August
item.description:
Street/gutter sweeping in Little Bornes only carried out in part of road. No sweeping or gutter clearance in front of No's 6 to 44 for a while. This section of Little Bornes is not cleaned every 5 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Bornes, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 vehicles obstructing footway making it impossible fot a pram or wheelchair to pass without going on.the road, 16th August
item.description:
A long 4x4 parked on the driveway of 80 Poversst road partially blocking the footway and another parked across the grass verge blocking the footway., also at 80 Poverest Rd. Wheelchair users or people pushing prams have to go on the road to pass

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Poverest Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not so nice cafe, 16th August
item.description:
The ground around Kelsey park cafe could do with tidying up. Cars and vans parked up alongside tents have ruined the grass and verges. Underneath the tents is unhygienic, weeds growing and dust and dirt. Owners could do so much to make it a more pleasant place to sit and eat. Please recommend to owners about strimming away weeds and overgrown grass and may be covering the floor under the tents with either shingle or bark chippings.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip on Winn common, 16th August
item.description:
Spotted new fly tip on Winn common. Crows are spreading the waste

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Winn Common Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Super hump with deteriorating edge, 16th August
item.description:
It's been like this for ages but I'll report again. The edge of the speed hump has deteriorated and now opens into a pot hole. I see others have reported this in May but it's still there and it's damaged my tyre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmesdale Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
